scripts.prepare-build: rimraf dist && npm run transpile && copyfiles README.md dist
scripts.publish-patch: npm run prepare-build && npm version patch && export-package-json && npm publish dist
scripts.publish-minor: npm run prepare-build && npm version minor && export-package-json && npm publish dist
scripts.publish-major: npm run prepare-build && npm version major && export-package-json && npm publish dist
scripts.link-version: npm test && npm run prepare-build && export-package-json && cd dist && npm link
